title: Intentional feeding should be a permanent ban.
body:
Just had a game with a B!tch Nidalee who just by 1 ping asking her to back off rather then turrent dive intentionally feed and went afk because of my ping. 1 SIMPLE PING and he fed after that. 

Seriously any one caught with proof of intentional feeding should be automatically perma ban rather then suspended, sending them a warning/suspension means nothing. Toxic people I don't mind should get the suspension then to perma ban but people who intentionally ruin the game for others over 1 SIMPLE ping should not have a chance.

Funny part is I saw a streamer name Shaclone get suspended recently for 14 days for intentionally feeding while another streamer Therainman had all 3 of his account banned for feeding 1 time, the dude had to beg Riot to get him unban and make it a suspension so why was Shaclone case different? I really don't care about streamer but if they intentional feed like any other player then they should be permanent ban.
